name: Minute Marriage
description:
Dear Season 24 Contestant,

We're so excited for you to meet you match.

As usual, you have only one minute to decide whether or not to tie the knot.

It's like speed dating with 100% more commitment!

Learn all you can about them and make your informed decision. 

Minute Marriage & Associates, Inc. are not legally responsible for what happens after you tie the knot OR reject your match.

May the wedding bells ring...

-----

Decide whether to marry your match in just a minute in the popular reality show - Minute Marriage! Ask questions to find out more about your matches' past and learn the truth behind the rose colored glasses. 

Will you have a happy wedding? Or will it end in divorce?

Remember, the whole world is watching...

Features:

  • Branching paths and conversation trees
  • ~1 minute of gameplay per route + epilogues 
  • 2 Endings + 1 Secret File to unlock!
  • Play in browser or download for Windows PCs.

--

Team Members:

E. Auten - Writing, Direction, Programming, Art 

A. Hintzen - Music, Programming

All backgrounds and illustrations (aside from the sprite artwork) were obtained from Creative Commons. 

--

Note:

This project was made in just a few hours for the One Minute Game Jam with the goal of learning something new for Passage: A Job Interview Simulator! Here, I learned how to implement a system variable for a New Game +! 

Please let me know if you have any feedback and I hope you enjoy the game!

~Em
